CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 7, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Notables at Soho Celebration - On Program - Outstanding speakers from all walks of life were among those heard on the Soho Community Association's Independence Day program here Wednesday. On the program were Wac Pvt. Hazel Roberts, Lieut. Charles B. Hall, Capt. William R. Thompson, Mollie Johnson, soprano; David Lawrence, candidate for Mayor, and Prothonotary David B. Roberts.  Senator Joseph M. Guffey and Judge A. Marshall Thompson can be seen in second row. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of man wearing U. S. Navy sailor uniform, man holding boy, and another man in military uniform, posed on platform of Fifth Ward Honor Roll and A. Leo Weil School, for fourth of July celebration by Soho Community Association, Centre Avenue, Hill District
